languages.text: {n}Некоторое время эльдарка задумчиво молчит.{/n} "Делиться переживаниями духа и разума, пытаться понять друг друга — действительно не тот путь, по котором нам суждено с тобой пройти. Ты все еще видишь во мне опасность и чуждость, элантах. И я не могу тебя в этом винить. Я... понимаю. И принимаю твой ответ".

{n}Yrliet lapses into a pensive silence for a time.{/n} "Sharing experiences of mind and spirit, trying to understand each other, is truly not the Path that you and I are destined to take. You still see me as something dangerous, something alien. And I cannot blame you for that, elantach. I... understand. And I accept your answer."
languages.original_text: {n}Некоторое время эльдарка задумчиво молчит.{/n} "Делиться переживаниями духа и разума, пытаться понять друг друга — действительно не тот путь, по котором нам суждено с тобой пройти. Ты все еще видишь во мне опасность и чуждость, элантах. И я не могу тебя в этом винить. Я... понимаю. И принимаю твой ответ".

languages.text: {n}Yrliet reflexiona en silencio durante unos instantes.{/n} «Compartir las experiencias de la mente y el espíritu, tratar de entendernos mutuamente, no es la senda que tú y yo estamos destinados a recorrer. Aún me ves como algo peligroso, algo alienígena. Y no puedo culparte por ello, elantach. Yo... lo entiendo. Y acepto tu respuesta».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lapses into a pensive silence for a time.{/n} "Sharing experiences of mind and spirit, trying to understand each other, is truly not the Path that you and I are destined to take. You still see me as something dangerous, something alien. And I cannot blame you for that, elantach. I... understand. And I accept your answer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet reflexiona en silencio durante unos instantes.{/n} «Compartir las experiencias de la mente y el espíritu, tratar de entendernos mutuamente, no es la senda que tú y yo estamos destinados a recorrer. Aún me ves como algo peligroso, algo alienígena. Y no puedo culparte por ello, elantach. Yo... lo entiendo. Y acepto tu respuesta».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットはしばらくの間、物思いにふけるように沈黙した。{/n}「我らの道は精神と心の体験を共有し、お互いを理解することができないように決められている。お前はいまだに我を危険かつ異質なものだと認識している。そう思われても仕方ないと思う、エランタ。お前の気持ちは…理解できる。そして、その答えも受け入れよう」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lapses into a pensive silence for a time.{/n} "Sharing experiences of mind and spirit, trying to understand each other, is truly not the Path that you and I are destined to take. You still see me as something dangerous, something alien. And I cannot blame you for that, elantach. I... understand. And I accept your answer."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットはしばらくの間、物思いにふけるように沈黙した。{/n}「我らの道は精神と心の体験を共有し、お互いを理解することができないように決められている。お前はいまだに我を危険かつ異質なものだと認識している。そう思われても仕方ないと思う、エランタ。お前の気持ちは…理解できる。そして、その答えも受け入れよう」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特沉默半晌，陷入沉思。{/n}“彼此分享心灵与灵魂的经历，试图相互理解，这显然并不是属于你我的道途。你依然把我看作某种危险、异类的生物。我无法因此责怪你，外界人。我……能理解。我接受你的回答。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lapses into a pensive silence for a time.{/n} "Sharing experiences of mind and spirit, trying to understand each other, is truly not the Path that you and I are destined to take. You still see me as something dangerous, something alien. And I cannot blame you for that, elantach. I... understand. And I accept your answer."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特沉默半晌，陷入沉思。{/n}“彼此分享心灵与灵魂的经历，试图相互理解，这显然并不是属于你我的道途。你依然把我看作某种危险、异类的生物。我无法因此责怪你，外界人。我……能理解。我接受你的回答。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet se mure dans un silence pensif pendant quelques instants.{/n} « Nous ne sommes pas destinés à suivre la voie du partage des expériences de l'esprit et de l'âme ou de la compréhension mutuelle. Vous me considérez toujours comme quelqu'un de dangereux, de différent, et je ne peux pas vous en vouloir, elantach. Je... comprends et j'accepte votre réponse. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lapses into a pensive silence for a time.{/n} "Sharing experiences of mind and spirit, trying to understand each other, is truly not the Path that you and I are destined to take. You still see me as something dangerous, something alien. And I cannot blame you for that, elantach. I... understand. And I accept your answer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet se mure dans un silence pensif pendant quelques instants.{/n} « Nous ne sommes pas destinés à suivre la voie du partage des expériences de l'esprit et de l'âme ou de la compréhension mutuelle. Vous me considérez toujours comme quelqu'un de dangereux, de différent, et je ne peux pas vous en vouloir, elantach. Je... comprends et j'accepte votre réponse. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet fällt für eine Weile in ein nachdenkliches Schweigen.{/n} "Erlebnisse des Verstandes und des Geists miteinander zu teilen und zu versuchen, einander zu verstehen, das ist nicht der Pfad, der Euch und mir bestimmt ist. Ihr seht mich noch immer als etwas Gefährliches, etwas Fremdes. Und das kann ich Euch nicht verübeln, Elantach. Ich ... verstehe es. Und ich akzeptiere Eure Antwort."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lapses into a pensive silence for a time.{/n} "Sharing experiences of mind and spirit, trying to understand each other, is truly not the Path that you and I are destined to take. You still see me as something dangerous, something alien. And I cannot blame you for that, elantach. I... understand. And I accept your answer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet fällt für eine Weile in ein nachdenkliches Schweigen.{/n} "Erlebnisse des Verstandes und des Gesits miteinander zu teilen und zu versuchen, einander zu verstehen, das ist nicht der Pfad, der Euch und mir bestimmt ist. Ihr seht mich noch immer als etwas Gefährliches, etwas Fremdes. Und das kann ich Euch nicht verübeln, Elantach. Ich ... verstehe es. Und ich akzeptiere Eure Antwort."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lapses into a pensive silence for a time.{/n} "Sharing experiences of mind and spirit, trying to understand each other, is truly not the Path that you and I are destined to take. You still see me as something dangerous, something alien. And I cannot blame you for that, elantach. I... understand. And I accept your answer."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, bir süreliğine kaygılı bir sükûnete gömülüyor.{/n} "Zihin ve ruh tecrübelerini paylaşmak, karşılıklı olarak anlaşmaya çalışmak... Bu, kaderlerimizde seçeceğimizin yazıldığı Yol değil. Senin gözünde hâlâ tehlikeliyim, hâlâ yabancıyım. Bunun için seni suçlayamam elantach. Ben... Anlıyorum. Cevabını da kabul ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lapses into a pensive silence for a time.{/n} "Sharing experiences of mind and spirit, trying to understand each other, is truly not the Path that you and I are destined to take. You still see me as something dangerous, something alien. And I cannot blame you for that, elantach. I... understand. And I accept your answer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, bir süreliğine kaygılı bir sükûnete gömülüyor.{/n} "Zihin ve ruh tecrübelerini paylaşmak, karşılıklı olarak anlaşmaya çalışmak... Bu, kaderlerimizde seçeceğimizin yazıldığı Yol değil. Senin gözünde hâlâ tehlikeliyim ve hâlâ uzaylıyım. Bunun için seni suçlayamam elantach. Ben... Anlıyorum. Cevabını da kabul ediyorum."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
